decks.notes: This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with Utopia Sprawl, Talisman of Impulse, and Eldrazi Temple to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also includes control elements like Kozilek's Command and Kozilek's Return to disrupt opponent's strategies. Malevolent Rumble and Writhing Chrysalis help control the board while Herigast, Erupting Nullkite provides a strong threat. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and disruption while utilizing ramp strategies.

The deck focuses on utilizing creature-based combos with Allosaurus Rider and Neoform to quickly ramp into powerful threats like Ghalta, Terastodon, and Griselbrand. The deck also includes support cards like Eldritch Evolution and Disciple of Freyalise to help facilitate its combos and generate additional value. With access to cards like Summoner's Pact and Eldritch Evolution, the deck is able to efficiently search for and tutor key pieces to assemble its combo and overwhelm opponents with big creatures.

This deck focuses on quickly generating mana through rituals and medallions to cast a large number of spells in one turn. Ral, Monsoon Mage's abilities allow for card selection and damage dealing, while Wish provides versatility in acquiring necessary pieces. The goal is to chain together spells to fuel Past in Flames and Grapeshot for a lethal combo finish. The deck also utilizes scrying effects to dig for key cards and has options for different game states with Elegant Parlor and Artist's Talent.

This deck focuses on using efficient creature tutors like Neoform, Eldritch Evolution, and Summoner's Pact to quickly assemble the Allosaurus Rider + Ghalta combo, allowing for explosive and game-winning plays. The deck also includes powerful utility creatures like Griselbrand and Terastodon to deal with various threats, as well as card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Consign to Memory to ensure consistent card advantage and combo piece access. The inclusion of Planar Genesis and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide additional value and versatility to the deck's game plan.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays, with an emphasis on quick damage output to overwhelm the opponent. It also incorporates burn spells and creature removal to control the board and maintain pressure. The deck aims to establish early board presence with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, supported by powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Arena of Glory provides additional buffs and support to keep the pressure on the opponent.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards like Basking Broodscale, Glaring Fleshraker, and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes ramp cards like Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga to accelerate its game plan. By combining synergistic cards and efficient threats, the deck aims to achieve a dominant position and win the game quickly.

This UW Control deck aims to control the game by utilizing a mix of counterspells, removal spells, planeswalkers, and card draw effects. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's plans while generating card advantage and maintaining board control. Cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Jace, the Mind Sculptor, and Narset, Parter of Veils help to control the game and out-value the opponent. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Path to Exile and Terminus to deal with threats. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and grind out a victory through control and resource management.

The key idea of this deck is to utilize the Jeskai Ascendancy combo to quickly generate mana and card advantage, while also controlling the board with cards like Portable Hole and Mox Amber. Emry, Lurker of the Loch works well with artifacts such as Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Narset, Jeskai Waymaster provide card draw and filtering. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with counterspells and removal spells, all while building up a powerful board presence to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.
